title: Long Live Your Death (1971, Western) Franco Nero, Eli Wallach | Full Movie

sources.title: Long Live Your Death (1971, Western) Franco Nero, Eli Wallach | Full Movie
sources.description:
The bottoms-up comedy hit that will fill your seats.
A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit, and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.

Original title: ¡Viva la muerte... tua! AKA: Long Live Your Death (1971)

This film is subtitled with many language options.

Director: Duccio Tessari
Writers: Dino Maiuri, Massimo De Rita, Juan de Orduña
Stars: Franco Nero, Eli Wallach, Lynn Redgrave
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, War, Western

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:48 A blind priest, hidden gold, and a daring escape in Yuma unfold in this Western adventure.
08:06 High-stakes escape, confessions, and an impending execution keep tensions high.
13:53 Treachery, traps, and a quest for gold drive this intense Western showdown.
20:27 Misunderstandings, ancient Greece references, and a tense standoff in Mexico.
25:33 A bounty hunt in Mexico reveals alliances and motives for capture.
32:51 Treasure hunts, escapes, and an epic Western confrontation.
41:47 The final showdown: gold, a deadly criminal, and justice at last.
1:03:15 A revolutionary woman leads a daring coup against a Mexican dictator.
1:13:31 Betrayal and battle erupt as military forces clash in a dramatic standoff.
1:28:20 Franco Nero and Eli Wallach star in a Western featuring royal intrigue, revolution, and a plot for a coup.
